comment: If you die months after recovering from COVID, it's a COVID death. If you die minutes to hours after receiving the COVID VAXXX, it's a "Coincidence!"
amr:
# ::snt If you die months after recovering from COVID, it's a COVID death. If you die minutes to hours after receiving the COVID VAXXX, it's a "Coincidence!"
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (d / die-01
            :ARG1 (y / you)
            :time (a / after
                  :op1 (r / recover-01
                        :ARG1 y
                        :ARG2 (d2 / disease
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "COVID")))
                  :quant (m2 / multiple
                        :op1 (t / temporal-quantity
                              :quant 1
                              :unit (m3 / month)))))
      :snt2 (c / coincidence
            :domain (d3 / die-01
                  :ARG1 (y2 / you)
                  :time (a2 / after
                        :op1 (r2 / receive-01
                              :ARG0 y2
                              :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "COVID"
                                          :op2 "VA"
                                          :op3 "XXX")))
                        :quant (b / between
                              :op1 (t3 / temporal-quantity
                                    :quant 1
                                    :unit (m4 / minute))
                              :op2 (m5 / multiple
                                    :op1 (t4 / temporal-quantity
                                          :quant 1
                                          :unit (h / hour))))))))

comment: It has yet to show it prevents transmission. If you get it your are in Phase trial. Safety studies wont be completed until . It is not approved by the FDA, only EUAOpioids and baby powder are recent examples of Pharma killing us. Im also floored and tired
amr:
# ::snt It has yet to show it prevents transmission. If you get it your are in Phase trial. Safety studies wont be completed until . It is not approved by the FDA, only EUAOpioids and baby powder are recent examples of Pharma killing us. Im also floored and tired
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-11
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / it)
            :ARG1 (y / yet)
            :ARG2 (s / show-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (p / prevent-01
                        :ARG0 ii
                        :ARG1 (t / transmit-01))))
      :snt2 (t2 / try-02
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (p2 / phase)
            :condition (g / get-01
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / it)))
      :snt3 (c / complete-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (s2 / study-01
                  :ARG1 (s3 / safe-01))
            :time (u / until
                  :op1 g
                  :ARG0 y2
                  :ARG1 ii2))
      :snt4 (a / approve-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "FDA"))
            :ARG1 (ii3 / it))
      :snt5 (e / exemplify-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (p3 / product
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "EUAOpioid"))
                  :op2 (p4 / powder
                        :mod (b / baby)))
            :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / Pharma)
                  :ARG1 (w / we))
            :time (r / recent)
            :mod (o / only))
      :snt6 a2
      :op1 (f / floored-01
            :ARG1 (ii4 / i))
      :op2 (t3 / tire-01
            :ARG1 ii4)
      :mod (a3 / also))
